TopicTitle: How long is a Munar day? (or night)

Articles.Content:
While I was off doing other things my dayside Mun operations became my nightside operations.

This is sort of a problem for my solar powered lander as well as my solar powered kethane miner.

So how long do I need to wait for the sun to come up?
